title: Strengthening Business Competencies: Practical Learning Design Using Graphic-Based EML

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: They can explain the core components of the IMS LD standard-based educational modeling language (EML) and present utilization scenarios.
They can independently design two or more science education learning designs (IMS LD) using graphic tools.
They can modify and improve existing learning design documents for application in digital learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
